description: Explore the rise of NFT scams in the growing digital art and blockchain sector. Learn about different types of scams, notable cases, and essential strategies to protect your investments. Understand the role of regulation in safeguarding the NFT market.
keywords: NFT scams, digital art, blockchain, counterfeit NFTs, phishing scams, pump and dump, rug pulls, fake endorsements, NFT fraud, protecting investments, NFT regulation
title: Understanding and Avoiding NFT Scams
